Question.Subject: https not showing secure info.?
Question.Content:
I just redirect the http to https in appache httpd.conf file in the server. but when I loading the page its showing SSL after that it is showing a warning message "However, this page includes other resources which are not secure....."
please help me
Question.ChosenAnswer: Websites often have 'assets' that are delivered using unencrypted techniques. Quite often, they are advertising, from 3rd parties not related directly to the site you've asked your browser to go to. Not a real big issue, but your browser is notifying you that the condition exists. This mild warning can be disabled in browser tools, security warnings, if you feel comfortable using 'https' and all it implies.

do you have ssl 2.0 or ssl 3.0 enabled
